useCase.name: Content Management and Strategy
useCase.description: This use case represents the process of managing content and strategizing

mainSequence.step: Content Designer explores existing content types
Content Designer requests content guidelines and editorial plan from Documentation
Content Designer requests participation in strategy meetings from Project Team
Content Designer participates and contributes in Content Strategy Meeting
Content Designer formulates recommendations at Recommendations
Team presents recommendations for approval by Team
Team updates CMS based on recommendations
Content Designer updates documentation at Docs
